anchors.text: While calibrating the narrative memory today, we watched BB-8 mimic the reteller's cadence.
A couple of weeks back, we demoed the prototype at Fontys; questions spiraled about forgetting curves.
Last autumn, in Rotterdam, the Reflective City pilot sparked debates over long-term narrative drift.

beats.text: While calibrating the narrative memory today, we watched BB-8 mimic the reteller's cadence.
Last autumn, in Rotterdam, the Reflective City pilot sparked debates over long-term narrative drift.
A couple of weeks back, we demoed the prototype at Fontys; questions spiraled about forgetting curves.

retelling: Yesterday, while calibrating the narrative memory, I watched BB-8 mimic the reteller's cadence, a rhythm that has been a constant in my experiences. This cadence was also present a couple of weeks back when we demoed the prototype at Fontys, the curves of the narrative drawing attention. This theme of narrative flow may have started last autumn in Rotterdam, where, if I recall correctly, the Reflective City pilot sparked debates over long-term narrative drift.
